languages.text: "Мерзкие выродки оскорбили духов мертвых, но, по счастью, успели куда меньше, чем могли бы. Многие усыпальницы потревожены, и, что самое возмутительное..." {n}Адальберт бережно преподносит вам драгоценный камень сапфирового цвета.{/n} "...урна Леди Теодоры".

"The accursed spawn have disrespected the spirits of the dead, but, thankfully, they did not have enough time to wreak as much destruction as they could have. Many tombs were disturbed, but what is the most outrageous..." {n}Adalbert carefully presents you with a sapphire-blue gemstone.{/n} "They sought to despoil Lady Theodora's urn."
languages.original_text: "Мерзкие выродки оскорбили духов мертвых, но, по счастью, успели куда меньше, чем могли бы. Многие усыпальницы потревожены, и, что самое возмутительное..." {n}Адальберт бережно преподносит вам драгоценный камень сапфирового цвета.{/n} "...урна Леди Теодоры".

Many tombs were disturbed, but what is the most outrageous..." {n}Adalbert carefully presents you with a gemstone resembling a sapphire in colour.{/n} "They sought to despoil Lady Theodora's urn."

Many tombs were disturbed, but what is the most outrageous..." {n}Adalbert carefully presents you with a sapphire-blue gemstone.{/n} "They sought to despoil Lady Theodora's urn."

Many tombs were disturbed, but what is the most outrageous..." {n}Adalbert carefully presents you with a sapphire-blue gemstone.{/n} "They sought to despoil Lady Theodora's urn."

languages.text: « Ces maudits rejetons des enfers ont manqué de respect aux esprits des morts, mais, fort heureusement, ils n'ont pas eu le temps de tout détruire. De nombreuses tombes ont été vandalisées, mais il y a pire... » {n}Adalbert vous présente avec force précautions une pierre précieuse bleu saphir.{/n} « Ils ont cherché à saccager l'urne de dame Théodora. »
languages.original_text: "The accursed spawn have disrespected the spirits of the dead, but, thankfully, they did not have enough time to wreak as much destruction as they could have. Many tombs were disturbed, but what is the most outrageous..." {n}Adalbert carefully presents you with a sapphire-blue gemstone.{/n} "They sought to despoil Lady Theodora's urn."

traits.locale_text: « Ces maudits rejetons des enfers ont manqué de respect aux esprits des morts, mais, fort heureusement, ils n'ont pas eu le temps de tout détruire. De nombreuses tombes ont été vandalisées, mais il y a pire... » {n}Adalbert vous présente avec force précautions une pierre précieuse bleu saphir.{/n} « Ils ont cherché à saccager l'urne de dame Théodora. »

languages.text: «Los malditos engendros han ofendido a los espíritus de los muertos, pero, por suerte, no han tenido tiempo suficiente para causar tantos daños como podrían. Han perturbado muchas tumbas, pero lo más indignante...». {n}Adalbert te presenta con gran cuidado una gema de color zafiro.{/n} «... es que han intentado saquear la urna de lady Theodora».
languages.original_text: "The accursed spawn have disrespected the spirits of the dead, but, thankfully, they did not have enough time to wreak as much destruction as they could have. Many tombs were disturbed, but what is the most outrageous..." {n}Adalbert carefully presents you with a sapphire-blue gemstone.{/n} "They sought to despoil Lady Theodora's urn."

traits.locale_text: «Los malditos engendros han ofendido a los espíritus de los muertos, pero, por suerte, no han tenido tiempo suficiente para causar tantos daños como podrían. Han perturbado muchas tumbas, pero lo más indignante...». {n}Adalbert te presenta con gran cuidado una gema de color zafiro.{/n} «... es que han intentado saquear la urna de lady Theodora».

languages.text: “那些被诅咒的怪物玷污了死者的灵魂，但帝皇保佑，他们的时间不够，没有造成太多破坏。尽管如此，许多坟墓还是被挖开了，而且最令人发指的是……”{n}阿达伯特小心翼翼，将一颗海蓝色的钻石递给了你。{/n}“他们居然打算破坏西奥多拉夫人的骨灰盒。”
languages.original_text: "The accursed spawn have disrespected the spirits of the dead, but, thankfully, they did not have enough time to wreak as much destruction as they could have. Many tombs were disturbed, but what is the most outrageous..." {n}Adalbert carefully presents you with a sapphire-blue gemstone.{/n} "They sought to despoil Lady Theodora's urn."

traits.locale_text: “那些被诅咒的怪物玷污了死者的灵魂，但帝皇保佑，他们的时间不够，没有造成太多破坏。尽管如此，许多坟墓还是被挖开了，而且最令人发指的是……”{n}阿达伯特小心翼翼，将一颗海蓝色的钻石递给了你。{/n}“他们居然打算破坏西奥多拉夫人的骨灰盒。”

languages.text: 「呪われた産毛は死者の霊を軽んじていたが、ありがたいことに、破壊の限りを尽くすには時間が足りなかった。多くの墓が乱されたが、最も非道なのは…」{n}アダルバートは丁寧にサファイアブルー色をした宝石を差し出した。{/n}「彼らはシオドーラ様の骨壷を荒らそうとしたんだ」
languages.original_text: "The accursed spawn have disrespected the spirits of the dead, but, thankfully, they did not have enough time to wreak as much destruction as they could have. Many tombs were disturbed, but what is the most outrageous..." {n}Adalbert carefully presents you with a sapphire-blue gemstone.{/n} "They sought to despoil Lady Theodora's urn."

traits.locale_text: 「呪われた産毛は死者の霊を軽んじていたが、ありがたいことに、破壊の限りを尽くすには時間が足りなかった。多くの墓が乱されたが、最も非道なのは…」{n}アダルバートは丁寧にサファイアブルー色をした宝石を差し出した。{/n}「彼らはシオドーラ様の骨壷を荒らそうとしたんだ」

languages.text: "Die verfluchte Brut hat die Geister der Toten geschändet, hatte jedoch glücklicherweise zu wenig Zeit, um noch größere Schäden anzurichten. Viele Gräber wurden gestört, doch das Schlimmste ist"{n}, Adalbert zeigt dir vorsichtig einen saphirblauen Edelstein,{/n} "dass sie Lady Theodoras Urne schänden wollten".
languages.original_text: "The accursed spawn have disrespected the spirits of the dead, but, thankfully, they did not have enough time to wreak as much destruction as they could have. Many tombs were disturbed, but what is the most outrageous..." {n}Adalbert carefully presents you with a sapphire-blue gemstone.{/n} "They sought to despoil Lady Theodora's urn."

traits.locale_text: "Die verfluchte Brut hat die Geister der Toten geschändet, hatte jedoch glücklicherweise zu wenig Zeit, um noch größere Schäden anzurichten. Viele Gräber wurden gestört, doch das Schlimmste ist"{n}, Adalbert zeigt dir vorsichtig einen saphirblauen Edelstein,{/n} "dass sie Lady Theodoras Urne schänden wollten".

languages.text: "Kahrolası yaratıklar, ölülerimizin ruhlarına saygısızlık etti. Neyse ki çok fazla yıkıma neden olabilecekken buna fazla zamanları olmamış. Birçok kabre girmişler ancak yaptıkları en ölçüsüz şey..." {n}Adalbert, sana dikkatli bir şekilde safir mavisi bir taş takdim ediyor.{/n} "Leydi Theodora'nın vazosunu kirletmek istemişler."
languages.original_text: "The accursed spawn have disrespected the spirits of the dead, but, thankfully, they did not have enough time to wreak as much destruction as they could have. Many tombs were disturbed, but what is the most outrageous..." {n}Adalbert carefully presents you with a sapphire-blue gemstone.{/n} "They sought to despoil Lady Theodora's urn."
